content: संसाध् {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be successful. {@--2@} To accomplish, complete; <ls>Ms. 2. 100.</ls> {@--3@} To secure, get, obtain. {@--4@} To settle. {@--5@} To regain; <ls>Ms. 8. 50.</ls> {@--6@} To cause to be settled or paid; <ls>Ms. 8. 213.</ls> {@--7@} To destroy, kill. {@--8@} To extinguish.
